array.name: safe_question
array.item: What is my place of birth?
What is the name of my primary school?

"Change permissions in your device\'s app settings. Give File Manager access to storage."
"Files moved into this category require password authentication. Add files to this category by pressing "Move to safe box" from the file menu."
"Encrypted images, audio, video, and documents, to protect your privacy data, please create a safe box and set the password to get access."
"Do not operate on the file folder to avoid damage to the encrypted data"
"Don\'t operate on this folder to avoid damage to the encrypted data"
"Remember the answers of security issues. If you forget your password, you can reset by answering security issues."
